testcase.name: Constructing a collection with valid permissions
Constructing a collection with invalid permissions

failure.message: failed Constructing a collection with invalid permissions

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Constructing a collection with invalid permissions
Given I am logged in as "user1" in the group "cm" Given I am on the my collections page When I press the button to add new collection And I enter valid metadata for a collection And I enter invalid permissions for a collection And I press the button to create a collection Then I should see a failure message for "invalid collection"
Message:
expected to find css ".alert" with text "Unable to create. Check set permissions" but there were no matches (Capybara::ExpectationNotMet) ./features/step_definitions/web_steps.rb:210:in `/^(?:|I )should see a (success|failure) message for (.+)$/' features/collections.feature:38:in `Then I should see a failure message for "invalid collection"'

Message:
Unable to find xpath ".//option[@value='Sound']" (Capybara::ElementNotFound) ./features/support/custom_matchers.rb:5:in `select_by_value' ./features/step_definitions/web_steps.rb:126:in `/^I select "(.*?)" from the selectbox for (.*?)$/' ./features/step_definitions/collection_steps.rb:30:in `/^I create a Digital Object in the collection "(.*?)"$/' features/collections.feature:63:in `When I create a Digital Object in the collection "<collection_pid>"'

Removing a Digital Object from a non-governing collection using the web forms
Deleting a collection as an admin

failure.message: failed Deleting a collection as an admin

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Deleting a collection as an admin
Given I am logged in as "user1" in the group "cm" Given I am not logged in Given I am logged in as "admin" in the group "admin" Given a collection with pid "dri:coll6" created by "user1@user1.com" When I go to the "collection" "show" page for "dri:coll6" And I follow the link to edit a collection Then I should see a button to delete collection with id dri:coll6 When I press the button to delete collection with id dri:coll6 Then I should see a success message for "deleting a collection"
Message:
expected to find button "delete_collection_dri:coll6" but there were no matches (Capybara::ExpectationNotMet) ./features/step_definitions/web_steps.rb:189:in `/^(?:|I )should( not)? see a button to (.+)$/' features/collections.feature:95:in `Then I should see a button to delete collection with id dri:coll6'

testcase.name: Non-admin should not be given option to delete
Committing a Digital Object which is a duplicate of an existing Digital Object in the same collection
